column4: How do I make it so that a group can read and write to a folder and it's contents? I need the www-data to write there. I already have the group that owns the file to www-data, and the permissions are at 775, but it's not working.
have you checked the user is associated with the group?
www-data is in the www-data group.
are we talking about Apache not being able to write?
www-data is not in the group by default despite what Apache says
This is a strange problem because I can read and write in another PHP script, but mkdir wont allow me to.
also you may need to turn off PHP safe_mode
Okay. So is this a PHP problem? Not Ubuntu-related?
PHP safe_mode won't let you write unless you own the files IIRC
that may explain why mkdir() is failing
Oh. Okay. I'll try that. Thanks :)
No, it still didn't work after I set it to 777.
maybe it's more than a permissions issue then
So what else do you think I can do?
